hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Install dependencies sudo yum install -y glibc-common git java-1.8.0-ibm java-1.8.0-ibm-devel boost-locale.s390x glibc-common
#Set Environmental Variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-ibm export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version export JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS=-Dfile.encoding=UTF8 export _JAVA_OPTIONS="-Xmx10g" export LANG=en_US.UTF-8
#Get the source code rm -rf hibernate-orm git clone git://github.com/hibernate/hibernate-orm.git cd hibernate-orm git checkout 5.2.10
mkdir -p $HOME/.gem/jruby/1.9
#Build hibernate ./gradlew build -x :documentation:renderGettingStartedGuides -x :documentation:renderIntegrationGuide -x :documentation:renderUserGuide -x test
#Store known failures echo '*** java.lang.instrument ASSERTION FAILED ***: "jvmtierror == JVMTI_ERROR_NOT_AVAILABLE" at JPLISAgent.c line: 1009 org.hibernate.jpa.test.criteria.nulliteral.CriteriaLiteralsTest > testCriteriaParameters FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.criteria.nulliteral.CriteriaLiteralsTest > testLiteralsInSelectClause FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.criteria.nulliteral.CriteriaLiteralsTest > testLiteralsInWhereClause FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.criteria.paths.SingularAttributeJoinTest > testEntityModeMapJoins FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.ejb3configuration.DisableDiscardPersistenceContextOnCloseTest > testDiscardOnClose FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.ejb3configuration.EnableDiscardPersistenceContextOnCloseTest > testDiscardOnClose FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.lock.StatementIsClosedAfterALockExceptionTest > testStatementIsClosed FAILED org.hibernate.test.boot.database.qualfiedTableNaming.NamespaceTest > testPhysicalNameSchemaAndCatalog FAILED org.hibernate.test.bytecode.enhancement.javassist.EnhancerFileNotFoundTest > test FAILED *** java.lang.instrument ASSERTION FAILED ***: "jvmtierror == JVMTI_ERROR_NOT_AVAILABLE" at JPLISAgent.c line: 1009 org.hibernate.test.criteria.CriteriaLockingTest > testSetLockModeDifferentFromNONELogAWarnMessageWhenTheDialectUseFollowOnLockingIsTrue FAILED org.hibernate.test.criteria.CriteriaLockingTest > testSetLockModeNONEDoNotLogAWarnMessageWhenTheDialectUseFollowOnLockingIsTrue FAILED org.hibernate.test.criteria.CriteriaQueryTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.ElementCollectionTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithBidirectionalManyToMany > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithBidirectionalMapsIdOneToOne > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithBidirectionalOneToMany > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithBidirectionalOneToOne > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithJoinedTableInheritance > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithJoinedTableMultiLevelInheritance > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithSingleTableInheritance > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithTablePerClassInheritance > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithUnidirectionalOneToOne > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.jdbc.internal.SessionJdbcBatchTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.locking.warning.LockNoneWarmingTest > testQuerySetLockModeNONEDoNotLogAWarnMessageWhenTheDialectUseFollowOnLockingIsTrue FAILED org.hibernate.test.resource.transaction.jdbc.autocommit.H2SkipAutoCommitTest > test FAILED org.hibernate.test.serialization.TypedValueSerializationTest > testTypedValueSerialization FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimeCustomTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimeDefaultTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimestampCustomSessionLevelTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimestampCustomTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimestampDefaultTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.boot.model.process.internal.ScanningCoordinatorTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.cache.spi.NaturalIdCacheKeyTest > testSerializationRoundTrip FAILED org.hibernate.cfg.annotations.CollectionBinderTest > testAssociatedClassException FAILED org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL81DialectTestCase > testMessageException FAILED org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.cursor.internal.StandardRefCursorSupportTest > testSupportsRefCursorsAboveJava8 FAILED org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorTest > testConnectionClose FAILED org.hibernate.engine.spi.EntityEntryTest > testSerializationAndDeserializationKeepCorrectPackedAttributes FAILED org.hibernate.engine.spi.EntityEntryTest > packedAttributesAreSetByConstructor FAILED org.hibernate.engine.spi.EntityEntryTest > testStatusCanBeSetAndDoesNotAffectOtherPackedAttributes FAILED org.hibernate.engine.spi.EntityEntryTest > testLockModeCanBeSetAndDoesNotAffectOtherPackedAttributes FAILED org.hibernate.engine.spi.EntityEntryTest > testPostDeleteSetsStatusAndExistsInDatabaseWithoutAffectingOtherPackedAttributes FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getConstantValue_constant_digits FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getConstantValue_simpleAlias FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getConstantValue_nestedAlias_non_conventional FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getMethod_superclass FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getConstantValue_nestedEnum FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getConstantValue_enumClass FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getMethod_nestedInterfaces FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_setMethod_nestedInterfaces FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getConstantValue_simpleAlias_non_conventional FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getConstantValue_outerEnum FAILED org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelperTest > test_getConstantValue_nestedAlias FAILED :hibernate-core:test FAILED BUILD FAILED' > $HOME/known_failures
#Run the testsuite and compare failures ./gradlew test -Dtests.haltonfailure=false --continue test 2>&1 | tee $HOME/testlog
grep FAILED $HOME/testlog | tee $HOME/failures
diff -u --ignore-all-space <(sort $HOME/failures) <(sort $HOME/known_failures)
